reviewText: A highly inspiring and insightful marathon of talks from people who themselves struggled with the deepest questions of life until they found their ultimate answer.  This video gives the watcher the advantage of potential shortcuts to be found in his or her own search based on the retrospective view of those elements the speaker's found most valuable on their paths.  At times, the profoundness of that which they found shines through like a beacon leading the watcher onward.
